title: Missing winter scutle crab icon
body:
I just got a Poro King icon that I wasn't even aware of and I still haven't received it yet? have they not given it out yet?
My friends also gifted their friends things but haven't gotten the icon yet either

replies.body: they said they're still distributing them http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KV7Qt4Yb-scuttler-snowdown-icon-not-recieved?comment=0000

> [{quoted}](name=Dunkin Darius,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=byqtykEw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-19T04:59:40.081+0000)
>
> they said they're still distributing them http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/KV7Qt4Yb-scuttler-snowdown-icon-not-recieved?comment=0000

Yup! We're trying to get these handed out ASAP! :)
